name: Occurrence of Eukaryotes in the size fraction >680 micrometres, collected worldwide during the Tara Oceans expedition (2009-2013) using a RÃ©gent net and analysed on a ZooScan imaging platform
description: The Tara Oceans project sampled contrastingecosystems of the world oceans during a three-yearexpedition(2009-2013), collecting environmental data and plankton, from virusesto metazoans, on board the36-metre Tara Schooner. It surveyed 210 ecosystems in 20 biogeographic provinces, collecting over 35,000 samples ofseawater and plankton. Samples were later analysedusing modern sequencing and state-of-the-art imagingtechnologies.
